item.title: Hamptons Film Fest Sets Sydney Sweeney Honor, World Premiere of ‘Merrily We Roll Along’ as Closing Night Film (Exclusive)
item.description: The ‘Euphoria’ star’s latest film, ‘Christy,’ will have its U.S. premiere as the centerpiece title at the event that has also added screenings of titles like ‘After the Hunt,’ ‘Bugonia,’ ‘Hamnet,’ ‘Is
